body:
Go ahead

And don't expect Opinions on me to be sugar coated
body_tagged:

And don't expect Opinions on me to be sugar coated
title: DipperPines_12's AMA

replies.body:
Hello DipperPines_12!

How are you?
You are a really awesome player with really cool PvP skills!
You are very active on the Forums!
I have to say, you are a REALLY cool person!
There are a few things I would like to know about you, so I will take this opportunity and ask you a few questions!

1. What is your real name?
2. What is your favorite color?
3. How old are you?
4. How tall are you?
5. What are your opinions on me?
6. What are your opinions on South Korea and Greece?
7. What is your favorite sport?
8. Why did you choose DipperPines_12 as your IGN?
9. Who is your favorite staff member?
10. What is your nationality?

Thank you so much!
Please continue to be a funny, and expressive person!
It could be an inspiration to some people!
I hope to see you in game!
Until then, hang in there, and stay strong!
Bye!

replies.body:
I'm good, thank you!
-Joseph
-Aqua
-14, but in 10th grade and almost 15
-5'9 and still growing
-Very Positive and you seem like a nice person
-I don't know about either really but I know Greece's economy is not doing great.
-Track
-Well this is my 4th rename but Dipper Pines is a character in my favorite show and I got the _12 from my first username
-resepignev
-Irish, Italian, English, American, and Slovak

Nice talking to you :)

replies.body:
-September
-When a team bonds together to build an op defense, when I get all 5 (now 2) on Quintus, or when I am just on a roll and like unkillable.
-I don't know you very well, but you seem like an ok guy. To be quite honest I didn't think you would pass your trial but good job, you did.
-Bunny
-Russian
--Yas!!!

replies.body:
-Я учусь русский язык потому мои браты тоже учишь русский язык. (I did the best I can do with what I know...basically, my Brothers take/took it so they could help me plus I didn't say it but I'm also Slovak so....
-Я хорошо учусь русский язык. (From What I know)
-Нет, но я хочу. (How bad is the driving there)

replies.body:
Я учу something(not учусь) 
Браты isn't a good word for brothers :D Братья is right.
.. тоже учат (not учишь) 

Yea, three russian problems are fools, roads and money (дураки, дороги, деньги)
Actually not so bad, if you use public transport ;)

Ok, I was torn between the reflexive verb or not, I'm rusty now that I am out of school.
Ok, we just learned Брат in school
And how did I miss that.,,,

Anyway, Thanks for correcting me! :)
